languages.text: "Обещаю, мы все исправим, когда вернемся домой. Я больше доверяю человеческим технологиям, чем ему".
"I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."
languages.original_text: "Обещаю, мы все исправим, когда вернемся домой. Я больше доверяю человеческим технологиям, чем ему".

traits.locale_text: "I give you my promise that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than his services."
"I give you my promise that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than his services."
"I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."
"I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."
"I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."
"I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

languages.text: « Je vous promets que nous réglerons ce problème une fois rentrés chez nous. Je fais plus confiance à la technologie humaine qu'à ses services. »
languages.original_text: "I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous promets que nous réglerons ce problème une fois rentrés chez nous. Je fais plus confiance à la technologie humaine qu'à ses services. »

languages.text: “我向你保证，等我们回去之后，我就会把所有问题解决掉。我更相信人类的技术，而不是他的服务。”
languages.original_text: "I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

traits.locale_text: “我向你保证，等我们回去之后，我就会把所有问题解决掉。我更相信人类的技术，而不是他的服务。”

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass wir alles geraderücken werden, sobald wir wieder zu Hause sind. Ich vertraue lieber menschlicher Technologie als seinen Diensten."
languages.original_text: "I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch mein Wort, dass wir alles geraderücken werden, sobald wir wieder zu Hause sind. Ich vertraue lieber menschlicher Technologie als seinen Diensten."

languages.text: «Trataremos ese asunto al volver a casa, te lo prometo. Confío más en la tecnología humana que en sus servicios».
languages.original_text: "I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

traits.locale_text: «Trataremos ese asunto al volver a casa, te lo prometo. Confío más en la tecnología humana que en sus servicios».

languages.text: 「故郷に戻ったら、すべてを解決すると約束する。私は彼の奉仕よりも人間の技術に信頼を置いているのだ」
languages.original_text: "I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

traits.locale_text: 「故郷に戻ったら、すべてを解決すると約束する。私は彼の奉仕よりも人間の技術に信頼を置いているのだ」

languages.text: "Eve döner dönmez her şeyi yoluna koyacağız, söz veriyorum. Onun uzmanlığındansa insan teknolojilerine güvenmeyi tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "I give you my word that we will fix everything once we return home. I put more stock in human technology than in his services."

traits.locale_text: "Eve döner dönmez her şeyi hâlledeceğiz, söz veriyorum. Onun uzmanlığındansa insan teknolojilerine güvenmeyi tercih ederim."
